title: Disney Pixar Cars Championship Download PC Game For Free
first_para: Rainbow Studios, THQ, Incinerator Studios, and Tantalus Media collaborated on Disney Pixar Cars: Mater-National Championship, an adventure racing game. The Walt Disney Company and THQ published this single-player videogame. This game was released on the Wii, PlayStation 2, Microsoft Windows, Game Boy Advance, Xbox 360, Nintendo DS, and PlayStation 3 on October 29, 2007. After its release, the game garnered positive reviews from a variety of critics.
